topic.title: Manga torrents
topic.body: Are there any zites with manga magnet links? We should pool our resources together to make it happen if it doesn't exist. I hate going to sites like manga now.

1_18JuREUrfUPwdwJLPA336tSjVaap8VSZp4.body:
You can delete anything on your own system.
You can choose to go to only sites with legal content.
This is exactly the same as the normal world wide web, except since there is centralized services governments can shut those down. Nobody can shut down Zeronet.

1_1L6kM35jc1KwpPi8LpEsCJmgXw2RM3UW1W.body: no girls on the zeronet. sorry.

1525663104_14AqVUuAqS3HsxsPzNgheYJEYWSQn.body: If you are a decent programmer I may be willing to anonymously hire you on future projects for bitcoin or monero. Find a way to get a bitcoin address where the private key won't be stolen by hospital employees. Try getting a family member to create it off site and then send an email to you with the public key/address.

1523809606_1KY1YYCNH5sDor7yu19jEr5yMtiZ5.body: Use Xbee to connect locations. Bandwidth is basically dialup speed, but can be prioritized for bitcoin, email and wikipedia type traffic to serve the greater good. Information, communication and financial transactions only need dial up speeds to do the most good to lift people out of poverty.
